analysis.summary: The 'day' field appears to be a date-related field for tracking completion dates, requiring day-of-month input validation.
insights: Field name 'day' with 'date_completion' context indicates this is part of a date input system
Likely represents the day component of a completion date (1-31)
September 2025 context suggests this is for future date scheduling or tracking
This is a date type field requiring numeric validation for valid day values
recommendations: Validation rules: Numeric only, range 1-31, adjust for month validity (e.g., September has 30 days)
Input format: Numeric input field or dropdown selector (1-30 for September)
Priority level: High - date fields are typically critical for completion tracking
Consider implementing month-aware validation to prevent invalid dates like September 31
